attributes.action: No VAT on medical equipment donated by a charity for use in a public place
attributes.additional_details: Current Goverment leglisation 20% VAT charged on Public Access Heart Defibrillators, including CHARITIES, means 1 in 5 pieces of desperately needed equipment is taken in tax. Help us to put a stop to a levy putting lives at risk by signing our petition. (Go to www.rrmc.webs.com for full details, including responses from HM Treasury MP David Gauke).
